thread.section_title: Roger Smith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fun in the City
thread.title_full: Fun in the City - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pamela A
title: Fun in the City
text:
This hotel is in a great location - walkable to many things in midtown and many restaurants and Grand Central only one block away. Each room is individually decorated and the lobby is Art Noveau style. Very hip and funky. Not a bland corporate place. The hotel provides free yogurt and granola for breakfast. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
There is a fair amount of background city noise - could be a problem for light sleepers.
Room Tip: If staying with a friend, the rooms with Hardwood floors and twin beds are great. See more room tips
